answers.answer: I only have had 2 but gonna have my 3rd in June. My first they had to put me asleep and second I was awake. They didn't cut you in the same spot?
Yes it was the same spot but they used staples instead of sutures to close it and it healed ugly. My first cut was a smooth line and barely visible. The second one looked different!
I am having my 4th c section in 6 weeks.  My last one went very smoothly. Your scar might look better after this one..did you talk to your dr about not using staples?

Yes i did. And they DO NOT use them so I'm happy about that. Were u awake for all of your c sections? Im nervous about that too. I want to be woke to meet him right away but i dont wanna go through feeling the pressure and tugging sensations again. In my mind ill be picturing whats going on down there and it scares me a little. Maybe i watched one too many videos about it  :-)

I am having me seventh c section in Sept.  They are all different .I was awake for all but it seems like the recovery gets harder and my last one was a week early from the schedule c section which was already a week early.

I have been awake for all of them too..mine have all gone about the same..only the last one made it til my scheduled date. I was in the or and watched a c section while in nursing school..so I understand completely what your saying about being nervous.. I an starting to get a bit nervous again too. It is so worth it though to be awake during it. Good luck..you'll do fine!

I have had two and I was awake for both with this pregnancy I plan on having a hba2c ( home birth after 2 c-sections) I will have this plan until the due date. I will not be pressured into something I do not want and I will be sticking to my birth plan rather than a stranger's birth plan. You will be fine, have no worries, you're a mommy and a strong woman.

question: Hi ladies. I am due to have my third c section in august. my first one went smoothly and i remained woke the entire time. My second one was very early due to preeclampsia so i was put to sleep for it and it left an ugly scar. I am apprehensive about getting another cesearean and i would like to hear some stories about moms who have had 3 or more. How did it go? And how was it different from the rest? Thanks in advance   ;-)
title: nervous about my 3rd c section
